mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enterprise_info (ei_no, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, ei_employees, ei_established, ei_business, ei_url, ei_ci, ei_majorbusiness, ei_logofile1, ei_logofile2, ei_logosize2, ei_map, ei_tpic, ei_date) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(ei_no), 0)+1 as ei_no FROM enterprise_info), #{ei_corporationname}, #{ei_slotname}, #{ei_crn}, #{ei_employees}, #{ei_established}, #{ei_business}, #{ei_url}, #{ei_ci}, #{ei_majorbusiness}, #{ei_logofile1}, #{ei_logofile2}, #{ei_logosize2}, #{ei_map}, #{ei_tpic}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT ei_no, me_name, me_nick, me_id, me_pw, me_tel, me_addr1, me_addr2, me_zipcode, ei_corporationname, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, me_email, ei_date FROM enterprise_info ORDER BY ei_no ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM enterprise_info
WHERE ei_corporationname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE ei_business LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE ei_corporationname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR ei_business LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT ei_no, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, ei_employees, ei_established, ei_business, ei_url, ei_ci, ei_majorbusiness, ei_logofile1, ei_logofile2, ei_logosize2, ei_map, ei_tpic, ei_date, r FROM( SELECT ei_no, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, ei_employees, ei_established, ei_business, ei_url, ei_ci, ei_majorbusiness, ei_logofile1, ei_logofile2, ei_logosize2, ei_map, ei_tpic, ei_date, rownum as r FROM( SELECT ei_no, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, ei_employees, ei_established, ei_business, ei_url, ei_ci, ei_majorbusiness, ei_logofile1, ei_logofile2, ei_logosize2, ei_map, ei_tpic, ei_date
FROM enterprise_info
WHERE ei_corporationname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE ei_business LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE ei_corporationname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR ei_business LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY me_no DESC ) ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}

SELECT ei_no, ei_corporationname, ei_slotname, ei_crn, ei_employees, ei_established, ei_business, ei_url, ei_ci, ei_majorbusiness, ei_logofile1, ei_logofile2, ei_logosize2, ei_map, ei_tpic, ei_date FROM enterprise_info WHERE ei_no = #{ei_no}
